charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a strong gust of
wind blowing through the mountains.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1101_0200:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] headed toward the noise to see what was
causing it, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across Cheren and Skyla.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_0300: Thank you for training with me, Skyla.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_0400: No problem! Battling with you was a ton of fun!
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_0500:
I’m impressed, Neo Champion! You totally know
how to bring out your Pokémon’s strength!
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_0600: Oh, no—I still have a lot to learn.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_0700:
I don’t even compare to a Flying-type Pokémon
expert like you.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_0900: Your Tornadus seriously blew my mind.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1000:
It looks so different from mine that I thought they
were totally different Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1100: Yeah, our Tornadus do look different...
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1200:
Since you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
why don’t we have a little study session?
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1300:
Some Pokémon can change forms, which can
change how they look and affect their stats.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1400: My Tornadus is in its Incarnate Forme.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1500: Skyla’s Tornadus is in its Therian Forme.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1600:
Tornadus is said to change its appearance when
its shown a Reveal Glass—a looking glass that
supposedly reveals a Pokémon’s true form.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1700:
Which of its forms is its true form, however,
remains a mystery.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_1900:
I wonder which one is its true form...
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_0402_2300:
You think so too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
We’re on the same wavelength, then!
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_2500: but maybe they’re BOTH its true form.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_2700:
People have moments when their behavior
changes depending on who they’re talking to or
what kind of situation they’re in, right?
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_2800: Maybe it’s the same for Tornadus.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_2900:
Just like how the Pokémon we raise with love
grow to have kind hearts...
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_3000:
changing the way we interact with them could
change their appearance, too.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_3100:
If it seems like something about our Pokémon has
changed, maybe that’s because there’s been a
change in our own thoughts or beliefs.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_3200:
This applies to Pokémon other than Tornadus, too.
Pokémon are like mirrors—they’re a reflection of
our hearts.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_3300:
As we walk alongside our Pokémon, maybe their
“true form” is what they look like in the moment.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_0401_3500:
*chuckle* Sorry for rambling on. I got a little
carried away.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_0402_3700:
*chuckle* I’d be glad if any of this was even a
little helpful to you.
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_3800: Pokémon are a reflection of our hearts...
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_3900:
Oh! That must be why you and your Tornadus
are so similar!
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_4000:
The way he crosses his arms reminds me of a
dependable teacher!
charaepi_ch0014_90_cheren/2301_1201_4300: I hope that’s how my students see me, too.
